All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BestMoveController
BestMoveController is a controller class that is used to do the best next move.
It dialogues with Window, NextBestMove and BoardImp.
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
Block
Class Block that extends JPanel to set graphical pieces for basics elements in Klotski.
Board
Class Board that extends JPanel to set graphical game board for Klotski game.
BoardImp
BoardImp is the main coding class.
It creates the Block array and sets it in the correct way.
It also checks for moves them and selects them.
It creates configuration for Board following Creator design pattern
BoardSelectController
BoardSelectController is a controller class that is used to Select or Deselect a Block.
It dialogues with Board.
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
FileRead
FileRead reads a saved file to get information about the game to restore.
It connects to [name_of_the_user].txt that has to have this form:
GameSaver
GameSaver create an object for saving the current game with every move,
the timer, moves counter and configuration.
It connects to [name_of_the_user].txt and writes text following this form:
HighScoreUpdater
HighScoreUpdater get the Best score for all the users and update them if necessary.
It stores elements in a Map with user as the key
HistoryController
HistoryController is a controller class that is used to set a game starting by a configuration or get a score.
It dialogues with Window, Board, HighScoreUpdater
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
IncrementsMoveController
IncrementsMoveController is a controller class that is used to increment or decrement the number of moves.
It dialogues with Window, Board, BoardImp, GameSaver, HighScoreUpdater
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
InfoController
InfoController is a controller class that is used to display info about the game.
It dialogues with Window
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
Klotski
Klotski class that connects LoginPage with Window passing the user.
It also implements WindowListener to catches whenever Window and LoginPage are closing.
LoginPage
LoginPage class is a graphical class that helps user to select one username or create one.
It dialogues with UsernameCollector to obtain stored users or to add a new one.
It extends JFrame and implements various Listeners, ActionListener, WindowListener, ListSelectionListener, KeyListener
For more information about Listeners
Main
Main class to play klotski game.
MoveController
MoveController is a controller class that is used to Move a single Block piece.
It dialogues with Window, Board, BoardImp
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
NextBestMove
NextBestMove gives the user the best possible move.
OpenFileController
OpenFileController is a controller class that is used to Open a saved game.
It dialogues with Window, Board, HighScoreUpdater
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
QuitController
QuitController is a controller class that is used to quit the game.
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
It uses the default Constructor cause there is no necessity of storing any other data from other classes
ResetController
ResetController is a controller class that is used to reset current game.
It dialogues with Window and BoardImp
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
SaveFileController
SaveFileController is a controller class that is used to change where to store current game log.
It dialogues with Window
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
SaveGameController
SaveGameController is a controller class that is used to save current game log.
It dialogues with Window and GameSaver
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
SelectConfigurationController
SelectConfigurationController is a controller class that is used to change the current configuration.
It dialogues with Window, BoardImp
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
UndoController
UndoController is a controller class that is used to undo previous move.
It dialogues with Window, GameSaver, BoardImp, Board
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
UsernameCollector
UsernameCollector reads a list of users in users.txt file, placed in resources/users_record.
It stores every user and can select one of them.
It is also possible to add a new user and write it in the txt file,
he stores it in a Vector.
It also gives the list of users, writing before the last used user.
Window
This is the main Graphical Class that connect all the Coding Classes with all the Graphics Classes.
It does not access and calls methods from other Graphics or Coding.
It extends JFrame to set Frame parameters and implements various Listeners.
Thanks to them, Window is able to call Controllers handling the Events.
It only instantiates every object and calls every controller in the right situation, handling various Listeners.
It is important to make Window it visible,
after it becomes instantiated, and to save the game with the right command.
For example:
